name: The Pandemic (ANlMO)
description:
Hello Gamers , This My First Game Jam ,i made This Game in 21 hours, I hope you enjoy With it, And i well be happy if you give me you Feedback to improve my self :).

Theme:

Out Of Control

The Story:

its About covid-19 

How to Play:

you have an injection, click on the patient to cure him, when you complete the objective the Button Called cure appear ,Click on it to Cure Every one and Win.

DONT FORGET THE FEEDBACK ^_^.
